  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114219</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114219</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nuclear fusion reaction of hydrogen isotopes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kernfusionreaktion der Wasserstoffisotope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction de fusion nucléaire des isotopes 
d'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação da fusão nuclear de isotopes do 
hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione di fusione nucleare degli isotopi 
dell'idrogeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση πυρηνικής τήξης των ισοτόπων υδρογόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción de la fusión nuclear de los isótopos 
del hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that a nuclear fusion reaction occurs when two light isotopes of hydrogen joins together to form a single stable helium nucleus.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">helium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">isotopes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear fusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stability</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß eine 
Kernfusionreaktion auftritt, wenn zwei helle Isotope Wasserstoff 
zusammen zum Formular einen einzelnen beständigen Heliumkern 
verbindet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre qu'une réaction de fusion 
nucléaire se produit quand deux isotopes légers d'hydrogène joint 
ensemble à la forme un noyau stable simple d'hélium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que uma reação da fusão 
nuclear ocorre quando dois isotopes claros do hidrogênio juntam junto
ao formulário um único núcleo estável do helium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che una reazione di 
fusione nucleare accade quando due isotopi chiari di idrogeno unisce 
insieme alla forma un singolo nucleo stabile dell'elio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι μια αντίδραση 
πυρηνικής τήξης εμφανίζεται όταν ενώνουν μαζί δύο ελαφριά 
ισότοπα του υδρογόνου για να διαμορφώσουν έναν ενιαίο σταθερό 
πυρήνα ηλίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que ocurre una reacción de 
la fusión nuclear cuando dos isótopos ligeros de hidrógeno 
ensamblan juntos a la forma un solo núcleo estable del helio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helium</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
